# The `SourceMgr` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This owns the files read by a parser, handles include stacks, and handles diagnostic wrangling. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::SourceMgr</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

This owns the files read by a parser, handles include stacks, and handles diagnostic wrangling.

Definition at line 31 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/sourcemgr-h">SourceMgr.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Public Member Typedefs

### DiagHandlerTy {#acf78be89ec851a45f37a776a5a58bfe8}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>using llvm::SourceMgr::DiagHandlerTy =  void (&#42;)(const SMDiagnostic &amp;, void &#42;Context)</>}>
Clients that want to handle their own diagnostics in a custom way can register a function pointer+context as a diagnostic handler.

It gets called each time PrintMessage is invoked.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/sourcemgr-h/#l00043">43</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/sourcemgr-h">SourceMgr.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

## Public Member Functions

### AddIncludeFile() {#ade78f93269ac7fa03b8ed1806262443d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>unsigned SourceMgr::AddIncludeFile (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> std::string &amp; Filename, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smloc">SMLoc</a> IncludeLoc, std::string &amp; IncludedFile)</>}>
Search for a file with the specified name in the current directory or in one of the IncludeDirs.

If no file is found, this returns 0, otherwise it returns the buffer <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a> of the stacked file. The full path to the included file can be found in <code>IncludedFile</code>.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/sourcemgr-h/#l00175">175</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/sourcemgr-h">SourceMgr.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/sourcemgr-cpp/#l00041">41</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/sourcemgr-cpp">SourceMgr.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### AddNewSourceBuffer() {#afe70aa1105a855036bdeb6426cac27db}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>unsigned llvm::SourceMgr::AddNewSourceBuffer (std::unique&#95;ptr&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorybuffer">MemoryBuffer</a> &gt; F, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smloc">SMLoc</a> IncludeLoc)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Add a new source buffer to this source manager.

This takes ownership of the memory buffer.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/sourcemgr-h/#l00144">144</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/sourcemgr-h">SourceMgr.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### FindBufferContainingLoc() {#a757ccf4ae54f435c3828c704ca65798e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>unsigned SourceMgr::FindBufferContainingLoc (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smloc">SMLoc</a> Loc) const</>}>
Return the <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a> of the buffer containing the specified location.

0 is returned if the buffer is not found.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/sourcemgr-h/#l00192">192</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/sourcemgr-h">SourceMgr.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/sourcemgr-cpp/#l00073">73</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/sourcemgr-cpp">SourceMgr.cpp</a>.

### FindLocForLineAndColumn() {#aff3380c7e96d28b108876d8e7b66e341}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="SMLoc SourceMgr::FindLocForLineAndColumn (unsigned BufferID, unsigned LineNo, unsigned ColNo)">
Given a line and column number in a mapped buffer, turn it into an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smloc">SMLoc</a>.

This will return a null <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smloc">SMLoc</a> if the line/column location is invalid.

### getFormattedLocationNoOffset() {#af8ebf8281d0ee499c10e259b917e4b1a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::string SourceMgr::getFormattedLocationNoOffset (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smloc">SMLoc</a> Loc, bool IncludePath=false) const</>}>
Get a string with the <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smloc">SMLoc</a></code> filename and line number formatted in the standard style.

Get a string with the source location formatted in the standard style, but without the line offset.

If <code>IncludePath</code> is true, the path is included. If false, only the file name and extension are included.

### OpenIncludeFile() {#a0c8517e1b412dcd4f30cdce1c9541cc9}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>ErrorOr&lt; std::unique&#95;ptr&lt; MemoryBuffer &gt; &gt; SourceMgr::OpenIncludeFile (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> std::string &amp; Filename, std::string &amp; IncludedFile)</>}>
Search for a file with the specified name in the current directory or in one of the IncludeDirs, and try to open it <b>without</b> adding to the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sourcemgr">SourceMgr</a>.

If the opened file is intended to be added to the source manager, prefer <code>AddIncludeFile</code> instead.

If no file is found, this returns an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a>, otherwise it returns the buffer of the stacked file. The full path to the included file can be found in <code>IncludedFile</code>.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/sourcemgr-h/#l00187">187</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/sourcemgr-h">SourceMgr.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/sourcemgr-cpp/#l00053">53</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/sourcemgr-cpp">SourceMgr.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

Prints the names of included files and the line of the file they were included from.
